Sentencas: Substituted ceria is a material which has attracted great interest in solid oxide fuel cell technology [45].
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: Due to its chemical stability, it may also be a promising candidate as a mixed conductive membrane for oxygen separation with flue gas contact.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: As part of this paper, dilatometry measurements and X-ray powder diffraction experiments were carried out on ceramic materials in air and in argon with two separate series involving the substitution of ceria; cerium was substituted with different amounts of Gd and Pr.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The first substitution of Gd caused an increase of the unit cell with a small rise in linear thermal expansion in relation to pure ceria. CeO2 (-) (delta) Band Ce0.8Gd0.2O2 - delta showed no chemical expansion in both atmospheres.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The second substitution of Gd with Pr decreased the unit cell in relation to pure ceria.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: It is therefore understandable that Pr is preferentially introduced and shown in this work as Pr4+ in ceria.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: These samples showed a remarkable chemical expansion in air and in argon.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The chemical expansion displayed a clear positive correlation with increasing Pr content.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients are comparable to the first substitution without any trend in relation to the amount of Pr.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The dilatometry behaviour above 400 degrees C can be explained due to the release of oxygen and simultaneous reduction of Pr4+, forming Pr3+ and oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: The results are in accordance with the two competing processes of forming vacancies (lattice contraction) and ionic radius change (lattice expansion)
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure
Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: After cooling in air, the samples showed no residual expansion.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure

Sentencas: In contrast, these samples displayed a remarkable residual expansion in argon of about 0.87% of the total relative expansion of 1.85% for Ce0.8Pr0.2O2 - delta.
Titulo: Expansion behaviour of (Gd, Pr)-substituted CeO2 in dependence on temperature and oxygen partial pressure
